description: Dashboard for spring boot 2 services. Displays standard spring metrics along with important data from kubernetes.

seriesOverrides.alias: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (method, uri) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m]))

targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", exception="None", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m])) / sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", exception="None", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[1m]))

panels.description: Actually, query works with 'outcome' attribute: [SUCCESS, CLIENT_ERROR, SERVER_ERROR]

targets.expr: sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="SUCCESS"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome="SERVER_ERROR"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

panels.title: Response Status Groups 2xx / 4xx / 5xx [5m]

targets.expr: sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (status) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m]))
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SERVER_ERROR", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m]))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", uri!~"$excluded_urls", outcome!="SUCCESS"}[5m])) by (method, uri) / (sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (method, uri) > 0)
sort_desc(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls", exception!="None"}[$__range]) > 0) by (method, uri))

seriesOverrides.alias: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[1m])) / sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[1m]))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SUCCESS"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SERVER_ERROR"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status="IO_ERROR"}[5m])) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (status) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m]))
sum by (method, uri, status) (increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome="SERVER_ERROR"}[5m]))

sum by (name) (irate(spring_integration_send_seconds_sum{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!~"$excluded_stream_channels", result="success"}[1m])) /  sum by (name) (irate(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!~"$excluded_stream_channels", result="success"}[1m]))
sum by (name) (increase(spring_integration_send_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", name!="unknown", result!="success"}[5m]))

seriesOverrides.alias: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (method) (irate(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", repository="$spring_data_repository_name"}[1m])) / sum by (method) (irate(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", repository="$spring_data_repository_name"}[1m]))

seriesOverrides.alias: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (repository, method) (increase(spring_data_repository_invocations_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", exception!="None"}[5m]))

sum(increase(cache_gets_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", result="hit"}[5m])) by (cache) / sum(increase(cache_gets_total{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (cache)

(
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="deploy/$app", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
) > 0

sum (
  sum by (pod) (avg_over_time(kube_controller_pod{namespace="$namespace", controller="deploy/$app", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval])) 
  * on (pod)
  sum by (pod) (increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod"}[$__rate_interval]))
)

sum by (method, uri) (irate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", outcome="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health)"}[5m]) / irate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", outcome="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health)"}[5m]))
sum by (method, uri, status, pod) (increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", outcome!="SUCCESS", uri=~"/actuator/(info|health)"}[5m]))

panels.title: Actuator Response Statuses 4xx/5xx by (method, path, status, pod) [5m]

targets.expr: jvm_memory_used_bytes{area="nonheap", id="Compressed Class Space", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"}
jvm_memory_committed_bytes{area="nonheap", id="Compressed Class Space", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"}
jvm_memory_max_bytes{area="nonheap", id="Compressed Class Space", namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod="$pod"}

seriesOverrides.alias: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.legendFormat: total (press shift + left click to hide)

targets.expr: sum by (command) (irate(mongodb_driver_commands_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[1m])) / sum by (command) (irate(mongodb_driver_commands_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$app"}[1m]))

title: Spring Boot + K8S Info
